sentences.en: Acquaint with the etiology , pathogenesis and syndrome differentiation of Dysmenorrhea.
sentences.cn: 熟悉痛经的病因病机、辨证分型.

sentences.en: Have steps been taken to acquaint breeders with their right to apply for licenses?
sentences.cn: 已经采取措施让饲养动物者了解他们申请执照的权利了吗？

sentences.en: He refused to acquaint me with his reasons for declining my offer.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝让我知道谢绝我提议的理由.

sentences.en: I need to acquaint myself with the new regulations.
sentences.cn: 我得熟悉一下新的规章制度。

sentences.en: I want to acquaint myself with your strengths and weaknesses.
sentences.cn: 我想知道你有哪些长处以及不足。

sentences.en: Its purpose is to acquaint trainees with the work of department heads.
sentences.cn: 其目的是让受训人熟悉各部门主管的工作.

sentences.en: Let me acquaint you with the facts.
Men who love wisdom should acquaint themselves with a great many particulars.
sentences.cn: 喜爱智慧的人应该让自己熟悉很多细枝末节的小事.

sentences.en: My assistant should be able to acquaint you with all the details.
sentences.cn: 我的助手会把所有的细节告诉你.

sentences.en: Please acquaint me with the facts of the case.
sentences.cn: 请把这事的实情告诉我。

sentences.en: Please acquaint me with the facts of the case.
sentences.cn: 请把这事的情况告诉我.

sentences.en: The proprietor was an old acquaint-ance of his.
sentences.cn: 业主是他的一位旧相识。

sentences.en: They did much to acquaint us with the problems of Latin America.
sentences.cn: 对我们了解拉丁美洲的问题他[它]们起了很大作用.

sentences.en: They entreat me to acquaint her with it.
sentences.cn: 他们一定要我把这件事告诉她.

sentences.en: Why she stares at me as if she is acquaint with me.
sentences.cn: 为什么她看着我仿佛她认识我似的.

sentences.en: You must acquaint yourself with the details of the new design.
sentences.cn: 你必须熟悉新设计的细节.

sentences.en: You must first if all acquaint yourselves with the market.
sentences.cn: 你必须首先要?解市场情况.

words.tran_cn: 熟识的；知晓的；有知识的

trans.tran_en: to make sb/yourself familiar with or aware of sth
If you acquaint someone with something, you tell them about it so that they know it. If you acquaint yourself with something, you learn about it.
